description: The objective of the “Global Urban Footprint” (GUF) project is the worldwide mapping of settlements with unprecedented spatial resolution of 0.4 arcsec (~12 m). A total of 180 000 TerraSAR-X and TanDEM-X scenes have been processed to create the GUF.
title: Global Urban Footprint
citation: Esch, T., Elsayed, S., Marconcini, M., Marmanis, D., Zeidler, J., Dech, S. (2014): Dimensioning the Degree of Urbanization – A Technical Framework for the Large-scale Characterization of Human Settlement Forms and Patterns based on Spatial Network Analysis. Submitted to Journal of Applied Geography
